scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run copy:client
scripts.copy:client: mkdir -p server/dist/public && cp -r client/dist/* server/dist/public/ && mkdir -p server/dist/data && cp server/data/data.json server/dist/data/ && cp server/.env server/dist/ && cp server/package.json server/dist/
